two_factor.title: Two Factor
two_factor.info: Two-step verification adds an extra layer of protection to your account. Whenever you sign in to the website, you’ll need to enter both your password and a security code created with your latch mobile app.
two_factor.warning: For security, please enter your password for %s if you wants modify the status.
two_factor.configure: To configure your Latch Cloud TOTP:

step.2: Use your app to scan the barcode below, or enter manually:
step.3: Enter the security code generated by your Latch mobile app to make sure it’s configured correctly.

email.exists: Account with that email address already exists

password.len: Password must be at least 8 characters long
